name: random_google
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nearby_places.
Tool description: Get nearby establishments.
API description: Returns a random place of a specified type within a given radius around the provided latitude and longitude.

lat.description: The latitude of the location around which to search for places.

lng.description: The longitude of the location around which to search for places.

type.description: The type of place to search for. Default is 'cafe'.

radius.description: The search radius in meters. Default is 500.
